p:
Lung samples were kept at −80 °C in RNAlater (Ambion, Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, USA) prior to RNA extraction (QiaAmp Viral RNA Kit, Qiagen, Hilden, Germany). Hantavirus positive RNAs, routinely confirmed by the reference laboratories by RT-PCR
30– 41 , were employed for exploring their genetic diversity by resequencing microarray.
